response.overview: Filmed in Derbyshire and London in 1978 with technical assistance, including sound recording, by Tim Bruce. Camera: P. Webb. Thanks to Tina and Elin Hunter. Quote: ‘It is incorrectly believed that she studied in the Hague and travelled the northern provinces before settling here.’ A number of clues articulated according to cinematic narrative codes. A Gamble risked on one shot? – P.W. (Film London Programme Notes)
response.title: Young Girl In Blue
